thread.title: Danny Welbeck and Christian Eriksen top FIFA 17's latest Goals of the Week with brilliant finishes
thread.title_full: Danny Welbeck and Christian Eriksen top FIFA 17's latest Goals of the Week with brilliant finishes

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Danny Welbeck and Christian Eriksen top FIFA 17's latest Goals of the Week with brilliant finishes
text:
Danny Welbeck and Christian Eriksen top FIFA 17's latest Goals of the Week with brilliant finishes The Arsenal forward scores a scorpion kick goal BETTER than Olivier Giroud's Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now FIFA 17 goals of the week Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Just as we think we're getting used to FIFA 17's insane Goals of the Week compilations, they release another to wow us all over again. 
Where last week's contained the filthiest solo goal you've ever seen, the latest compilation focuses purely on finishing - and there are some beauties. 
There's a cracking overhead kick from Karim Benzema, a wonder volley from Antoine Griezmann and dish of a goal from Juan Caudrado. 
But the real goals of the week lie with Premier League stars Danny Welbeck and Christian Eriksen. (Photo: YouTube/EA SPORTS FIFA) 
The Arsenal forward finds a loose ball in the box fall behind him, and cleverly improvises with a brilliant scorpion effort. Olivier Giroud eat your heart out. 
But in true north London rivalry fashion, Spurs can't let Gunners fans or players have it all their own way. (Photo: YouTube/EA SPORTS FIFA) 
Approximately halfway through the video, Eriksen also finds a ball fall behind him in the penalty area. 
But instead of producing a scorpion kick, Eriksen takes a filthy first touch with his heel to move the ball in front of him. The Spurs midfielder then rifles a volley into the roof of the net. 
Outstanding. Who scored the better goal - Welbeck or Eriksen? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
